Because of people like me? If assaults go up it will more than likely be because of people who are filled with rage and hate attacking people who have been going to bathrooms that correspond to their identity for years now. It wasn't an issue until fear mongers and anti-lgbt bigots made it an issue. It has been happening for years now, and assaults arent being handed out by transgenders. Unfortunately, more assaults are carried out by hateful people against lgbt people. People should respect other's privacy in the bathroom and they wouldn't notice or care.
